text: Minifootball is a variation of association football. It is mainly play in 5-a-side, 6-a-side, 7-a-side and 8-a-side on an astro turf. The highest authority of mini football is currently World Minifootball Federation. Over the years, the popularity of minifootball have increased from South America to Europe and to Asia. ==References== * Category:Association football variants
title: Minifootball
